title: Microphone In Hand T-Shirt for Comedians, Speakers, Protests
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester

Are you a public speaker of any kind? Then you know how powerful a microphone can be. Of course it depends on the speaker behind it, but the mighty microphone helps to lead or entertain the masses. Graphic is a bold distressed fist grasping a microphone.

Perfect for stand-up comedians, public speakers, conferences, talks, musicians & bands, preachers, politicians, or anyone who is behind a microphone. Great as a gift for anyone that loves the spotlight or power of the microphone. Get one and be heard!
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
